data.name: Biggest Week In Action Sports
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Biggest Week in Action Sports tells the story of two monumental world first attempts – the FMX Triple Backflip and the BMX Quadruple Backflip – that took place in one extraordinary week at Pastranaland. With never-before-seen footage and brand new commentary from legends like Tony Hawk, Danny Way, Mat Hoffman, Sage Kotsenburg, Bucky Lasek and more, this riveting documentary captures all the danger and drama behind two monumental world’s first attempts: the motorcycle triple backflip and the BMX quadruple backflip.
data.about_the_game: Biggest Week in Action Sports tells the story of two monumental world first attempts – the FMX Triple Backflip and the BMX Quadruple Backflip – that took place in one extraordinary week at Pastranaland.  With never-before-seen footage and brand new commentary from legends like Tony Hawk, Danny Way, Mat Hoffman, Sage Kotsenburg, Bucky Lasek and more, this riveting documentary captures all the danger and drama behind two monumental world’s first attempts: the motorcycle triple backflip and the BMX quadruple backflip.
data.short_description: Biggest Week in Action Sports tells the story of two monumental world first attempts – the FMX Triple Backflip and the BMX Quadruple Backflip – that took place in one extraordinary week at Pastranaland.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
